archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: GI Interface; DB Schenker SAP --> Vestas SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Schenker is posting goods issue. This process is used when tools and spare parts are needed for a service on a turbine and are ​ delivered from main warehouse in Mutzschen
An outbound delivery is created by Vestas if the materials are available in the stock. This outbound delivery is sent to ​Schenker by using the IDoc DELVRY03. - Schenker creates a transfer order in their system based on the outbound delivery that Schenker has received. Schenker sends​ information to Vestas that they have started the picking. This information is sent using the IDoc DELVRY03​ (Includes the qualifier PIC). ​ - When Schenker has picked the materials they make a post goods issue. This is interfaced to Vestas’ system using the ​IDoc DELVRY03 including information regarding batches and serial numbers if the materials need this information​ (Includes goods issue qualifier PGI). ​ - During the GI confirmation all serial No. relevant items should be consolidated by Schenker: Schenker activated ​Batch Management for the SN relevant items (1SN = 1 Batch-No.). Because of batch split on Schenker side the consolidation is​ necessary.
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
